meanings.definition: A device for connecting two parts of a machine.
meanings.sent1: The couplers joined the pipes securely.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used couplers to link the cables together.
meanings.sent3: The couplers decided to have a party and connect all the machines in the factory.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the perfect coupler, bringing joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The bright red couplers stood out in the sea of machine parts.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that couples.
meanings.sent1: The couplers at the dance class were skilled at teaching the steps.
meanings.sent2: The book highlighted the importance of good communication between couplers.
meanings.sent3: The couplers in the movie were always trying to matchmake their friends.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a coupler, bringing people together in friendship.
meanings.sent5: The little girl saw herself as a coupler, always trying to bring harmony to her family.
